title: Introduce MergePlanner interface + strategy stubs
body: Define MergePlanner interface and stubs for merge-tree and worktree strategies. No IO yet; just types and wiring.

title: CLI "--project-merge" plumbing + env detection
body: Add flag/env handling to predict/report. Print placeholder projection status to verify wiring.

title: Extend moriartyReportSchema with projection block
body: Add "projection" to schema (status, merge meta, scores, deltas). Update renderer with a minimal "Projected After Merge" section.

title: Implement merge-tree strategy (clean merge path)
body: Use "git merge-tree --write-tree" to compute merged tree and materialize into a temp dir. No conflicts in this path.

title: Implement worktree fallback + conflicts detection
body: Ephemeral worktree from base; "git merge --no-commit --no-ff HEAD"; detect conflicts and cleanup.

title: Run Wesley/HOLMES/WATSON on merged tree and compute deltas
body: Generate temp bundle; run analysis; compute deltas vs HEAD; populate projection.scores + delta in JSON.

title: Result caching keyed by (HEAD, baseRef, mergeBase)
body: Skip recompute if projected tree equals HEAD; memoize by tuple and short-circuit.

title: Config knobs + CLI/README help for projection
body: Document flags/env; add examples for CI and local PR testing; clarify degradation paths.

title: Unit tests: MergePlanner (dry), schema shapes, deltas
body: Injectable dry runner for deterministic outcomes; assert schema shape and delta math.

title: Integration test: clean-merge fixture repo
body: Tiny fixture with clean merge; assert "status: clean" and non-null projection scores.

title: Integration test: conflict-merge fixture repo
body: Fixture producing conflicts; assert "status: conflicts" and conflict file list surfaced.

title: CI wiring: auto-enable projection on PRs
body: When GITHUB_BASE_REF present, run with --project-merge; print projected summary in job output.
